name: UnityMediationAdapter
summary: The UnityMediationAdapter Framework provides definition for communication between ad network adapters and the UnityMediationSdk
description: This framework defines how communication in the UnityMediationSdk should occur with ad networks. To integrate with the UnityMediationSdk ad networks must implement the interfaces defined in this module.
